messages.message:
This FR (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-845) was opened a while back about providing progress updates for OCR.

We’re passing this info back from the backend (I can see the % in the /status calls). But we’re not showing it in the UI.

We’ve had a few customers now think that their upload is stuck, when its just a long document taking a while to process - but we have non-deterministic spinners.
is this for Build or Converse (or both?) This work is being scoped for Build — targeting 24.14
I think both - great to hear its being scoped!
We should launch this design at both build and converse. cc @Hari
